TextBody:
Hello Sujith,

Thank you very much for contacting us.

Would you be able to re-generate the certificate and import it again on the devices?

That way you can ensure all of them get the latest available one and also make sure you set it to trusted.

More details can be found here:

Deep Packet Inspection

Looking forward to your response.

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com
